title: Citi Recognized by Dow Jones Sustainability Index for 18th Consecutive Year
summary: New York - Citi has been named to the Dow Jones Sustainability World and Dow Jones Sustainability North America indices (DJSI) for the 18th consecutive year. DJSI is the longest-running global sustainability benchmark and includes the world's leading sustainable companies based on an assessment of a wide range of economic and environmental, social and governance (ESG) factors. Citi's inclusion in the DJSI is recognition of our continuing leadership in advancing economic, environmental and social progress around the world.

tag-3: For the 17th year in a row, Citi was named a constituent company of the FTSE4Good Index following its June 2018 index review. The FTSE4 Good Index Series measures the sustainability performance of companies and includes companies that demonstrate strong environmental, social and governance practices. For additional information on Citi's corporate citizenship and sustainability efforts, please visit http://www.citigroup.com/citi/about/citizenship/.
